Module kopper.tetris

Package kopper.tetris.core

This package contains all the classes that render parts of the Tetris game screen.
Author:
KopperKnight
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundGrid
    A class that defines the background area of the Tetris game.
    Coord
    A class to represent the x,y components of a Cartesian coordinate pair.
    GridCell
    This class is designed to make the painting of the game simplified.
    StartPauseScreen
    This class represents the drawing information for both game states: TetrisGame.State.GAME_PAUSED and TetrisGame.State.GAME_START_SCREEN.
    TetrisGame
    This class combines all of the data models and drawable items (Classes with drawOBJECTNAME(Graphics2D g2d); to perform all the major functions a Tetris Game would be expected to provide on an overall level.
    TetrisGame.State
    A Class which represents the state of a TetrisGame.
    TetrisScore
    A class that keeps track of the score.
    TetrisStarter
    This class provides the entry point to the Tetris Game application.
    TetrominoStats
    This class keeps track of pixel data and colors and shapes to draw the score area of the Tetris Game.
